title: I lost Hextech stuff
body:
I finally got my third key fragment.
I forged the key and used it to open a chest.
My client said the connection Timed-Out and to restart my client.
I restarted and I had lost my key and a chest while not receiving loot from the chest I opened...

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like you received the Recon PROJECT: Ashe Summoner Icon and 150 orange essence from that Hextech box.

If you have any other questions, let me know!

I guess I overlooked my essence and the icon... (what can I say, I'm stupid)

Thanks for checking!
To prevent future confusions I'd advise for the client to tell the player next login what they got if a timeout occurs.
